issue.title: [C++] Support additional source types in SourceNode
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17610](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17610). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This issue will add support for `ArrayVector`, `ExecBatch`, and `RecordBatch` sources in `SourceNode`. See [this thread](https://lists.apache.org/thread/9l23c0w48ywx314klbyshz8ntyzgs1zw) for context.
